name: Compute Options and EC2 Basics
description: Introduction to AWS compute services including virtual machines, container services, and serverless

cards.front: You need full control over the operating system and software on a virtual server for your application. Which AWS compute service should you use?
cards.back: Use Amazon EC2, which provides resizable compute capacity and allows you to configure the guest OS and install any software needed.
cards.example: A developer deploys a LAMP stack by launching an EC2 instance with a Linux AMI, installing Apache, MySQL, and PHP.
cards.subject: Compute as a Service on AWS
